items.sentence: Do you and Tom spend a lot of time together?

Wake me up when you get home if I\'m asleep.

I want you to think about what might happen.
I wanted Tom to help Mary with her homework.
Tom doesn\'t like to be corrected in public.
I swear I never showed anyone that document.
I think I just heard someone call your name.
I think I left my keys on the kitchen table.
Why are you throwing that stuff in the fire?
Social customs vary from country to country.
The police promised to look into the matter.
The poor old woman had her bag stolen again.
The public will be notified on October 20th.
The red belt goes well with her black dress.
Tom is being very obedient today, isn\'t he?
This is the hotel where we stayed that time.
Last month, my family and I moved to Boston.
Let me stay with you just five more minutes.
He apologized to me for stepping on my foot.
He had no difficulty explaining the mystery.
You\'re making a mountain out of a molehill.
I\'ll never forget the sound the crash made.
I\'ll never forget what you just did for me.
I\'ll return your books as soon as possible.
I\'ll see to it that it never happens again.
Tom vanished under mysterious circumstances.
Tom visits me every time he comes to Boston.
Tom wakes up at the crack of dawn every day.
Tom wanted Mary to drive him to the airport.

Do you know the girl standing by the window?

Do you plan to continue working until 10:00?
Do you promise not to tell anybody anything?
All my friends encouraged me to try my best.
All the passengers were saved from drowning.
Any comments will be gratefully appreciated.
Anybody wanna grab something to eat with me?
I don\'t want Tom to think I was being rude.

I can\'t imagine anybody would be surprised.
Tom might be able to tell us how to do that.
Tom might not be as happy as we think he is.
Tom might think that we want him to do that.
Tom moved to Boston soon after he graduated.
When you come next time, bring your brother.

We needed three more points to win the game.

Tom went to Korea as a Christian missionary.
Tom will be there tomorrow without question.
Tom will furnish you with anything you need.
It\'s important that you practice every day.
It\'s important to know what has to be done.

Tom considered the possibility of not going.
Mary hasn\'t shaved her legs in three years.
Tom probably didn\'t know about the meeting.
Tom probably doesn\'t even know who Mary is.
Tom and Mary\'s marriage lasted three years.
Are you sure I can\'t get you another drink?
Are you sure it\'s not the other way around?
I heard about what happened at school today.
I heard that Tom asked his boss for a raise.
She\'s not my grandmother. She\'s my mother.
I shouldn\'t have to put up with this noise.
I think we both know who\'s really to blame.

Tom promised to return the books I lent him.

Everybody is hoping nothing bad will happen.

Have you ever visited the Statue of Liberty?

Did you sleep on the couch again last night?
I haven\'t been invited to Tom\'s party yet.

If I knew Tom\'s address, I\'d write to him.

I didn\'t see the explosion. I just felt it.
I didn\'t think Tom would give up like that.
Tom doesn\'t speak either French or English.
Tom doesn\'t think Mary has passed away yet.
Tom doesn\'t think Mary is going to do that.
